11.sentence: " SOURCE LANGUAGE: The ant proposed: \"From 'Oui'a to the beach at 'Omo'a.\". TARGET LANGUAGE: Pe'au te k\u014d : \"Mei 'Oui'a io he one i 'Omo'a.\". GRAMMATICAL DESCRIPTION:  GRAMMATICAL KEYWORDS: "

14.sentence: " SOURCE LANGUAGE: Then the fly said, \"No, I am stronger.\". TARGET LANGUAGE: Pao, pe'au te ti'au'e : \"A'o'e, mea 'i'i atu au.\". GRAMMATICAL DESCRIPTION:  GRAMMATICAL KEYWORDS: "

15.sentence: " SOURCE LANGUAGE: You will carry yours; I will carry mine.. TARGET LANGUAGE: 'Ave 'oe ta 'oe, 'ave au i t\u0101'u.. GRAMMATICAL DESCRIPTION:  GRAMMATICAL KEYWORDS: "

22.sentence: " SOURCE LANGUAGE: One day, on a rock strewn with animal carcasses. TARGET LANGUAGE: E, i titahi '\u0101, i 'una o titahi 'outu, me te 'animara mate i 'una. GRAMMATICAL DESCRIPTION:  GRAMMATICAL KEYWORDS: "

23.sentence: " SOURCE LANGUAGE: When he went to observe, he could not see where the ant and the rock were.. TARGET LANGUAGE: Te hanotia ti'ohi, a'e e 'itea mai i hea te k\u014d me te ke\u2019\u0101.. GRAMMATICAL DESCRIPTION:  GRAMMATICAL KEYWORDS: "

28.sentence: " SOURCE LANGUAGE: The rock still lies there, just behind the soccer field.. TARGET LANGUAGE: E avai nei te\u2019\u0101 ke\u2019\u0101, ma uta nei o te tohua popo.. GRAMMATICAL DESCRIPTION:  GRAMMATICAL KEYWORDS: "
